ygData.subject: Re: Amulet of Order
ygData.msgSnippet: ... an ... only ... I recently purchased a steel breastplate.  It was 980 or so platinum at 90 charisma.  Putting on my two +5 charisma items reduced the price
ygData.messageBody:
>my experience is that 95 is the limit on vendors. well i made a gnome
>enchanter to buy all my platemail armor, he had 95 charisma. i gave him
an
>opalline earring plus 5 charisma and got the same prices. that is the
only
>time i have experimented.

I recently purchased a steel breastplate. It was 980 or so platinum at 90
charisma. Putting on my two +5 charisma items reduced the price by around
40 plat. I then got a friendly shaman to cast a charisma buff on me,
bringing my total up to 115; this brought the price down to less than 900
platinum. Sorry, I don't remember the exact figures.

- Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
